Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

If you have any questions, simply reply to this email or call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom, America's #1 legal document service.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Patent Team
